document.docAuthor: Naveed, Hassan, Shah, Bismillah, Sohail, Kamran & Zhang, Yalin
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the leafhopper genus Stirellus Osborn & Ball, 1902 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of two new species from Pakistan

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the leafhopper genus Stirellus Osborn & Ball, 1902 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of two new species from Pakistan

bibRefCitation.author: Osborn, H. & Ball, E. D.
bibRefCitation.refString: Osborn, H. & Ball, E. D. (1902) A review of the North American species of Athysanus (Jassidae). The Ohio Naturalist. A Journal Devoted More Especially to the Natural History of Ohio, 2, 231 - 256.
